item.title: About
item.description: Kazufumi Yamana Ph.D. (Economics) HERMES-IR Social service activities 2017.4 - Assistant professor, Kanagawa University, Faculuty of Economics Message from Professor (Japanese) Visiting researcher, Policy Research Institute, Ministry of Finance, Japanese Government 2015.4 - 2017.3 Economist, Policy Research Institute, Ministry of Finance, Japanese Government Research interests Macroeconomics Computational statistics / Machine learning Computational economics Nekonomics Languages Python Matlab Editor Vim Lecture Kanagawa University Macroeconomics (2018, 2017) Microeconomics (2018, 2017) Economic data processing (2015) Ministry of Finance Introduction to statistics (2018, 2017) Applied econometrics (2018) Statistics (2018, 2016) Time series econometrics (2017, 2016, 2015) Tokyo Institute of Technology Economics A (2016) Chiba University Economic statistics (2017, 2016)
